answerText: coagulation [or blood clotting][10] This cofactor, which is required for the carboxylation of glutamate residues in blood clotting proteins, is found in large quantities in dark leafy vegetables.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 9 | 20 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Both heparin and warfarin are used to stop this process, which relies on a namesake cascade of factors.  [10] Name this biological process in which blood loss from an area of injury is stopped by the forming of a cross-linked fibrin thrombus over the wound.
